verbose_text: Interestingly, nifedipine, a blocker of L-type voltage dependent Ca 2+ channels, abolished these ERbeta actions [XREF_BIBR], suggesting that estrogen regulates neuronal function via ERbeta.
evidence: nifedipine, a blocker of L-type voltage-dependent Ca 2+  channels, abolished these ERbeta actions [ XREF_BIBR ], suggesting that estrogen regulates neuronal function via ERbeta
